description: MainActivity.kt defines the main entry point of an Android TV application built with Jetpack Compose. It sets up the UI theme, initializes the home screen with mock data, and handles key events specific to TV remote navigation.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: MainActivity is the Android TV entry point, hosting a Jetpack Compose UI with TV-friendly navigation and static mock data.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets the Compose content with themed home screen, and manages selected item state.

methods.name: onKeyDown
methods.description: Handles key events from the TV remote, specifically DPAD, Enter, and Back keys.
